description: This Java class functions as a REST controller within a Spring Boot application, managing transaction-related HTTP requests such as fund transfers and utility payments.

classes.name: TransactionController
classes.description: Controller class that exposes endpoints for transaction management such as fund transfers and utility payments.

methods.name: fundTransfer
methods.description: Handles POST requests for initiating a fund transfer transaction.

methods.name: utilPayment
methods.description: Handles POST requests for processing a utility payment.
